function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Monitoring air quality parameters at infrequent intervals","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne virus transmission due to the lack of real-time monitoring and response","Mitigation":"Frequent real-time monitoring of air quality parameters and swift response to any deviations from standard values","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, real-time monitoring systems","People":"Occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate control of airflows in micro spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission between micro spaces due to uncontrolled airflow","Mitigation":"Controlled air circulation, negative pressure systems, self-closing doors, and air exhaustion to minimize virus transmission","Technologies":"Negative pressure systems, self-closing doors, air exhaustion systems","People":"Occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate natural ventilation levels","Impact":"Decreased air freshness and increased risk of airborne virus transmission due to inadequate natural ventilation","Mitigation":"Promotion of natural ventilation, use of environmental-friendly ventilation systems, and implementation of measures to increase air freshness","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, environmentally-friendly ventilation systems","People":"Occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building management, facility staff"}]}
